w;s úfYI
wxl 2400$22 - 2024 iema;eïn¾ ui 05 jeks n%yiam;skaod - 2024.09.05
No. 2400/22  -  thursday,  september  05,  2024
EXTRAORDINARY
Y%S ,xld m%cd;dka;%sl iudcjd§ ckrcfha .eiÜ m;%h
The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka
(Published by Authority)
PART I : SECTION (I) — GENERAL
Government Notifications
1a - pG 6860 - 154 (09/2024) 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk
FOREST CONSERvATION ORDINANCE
the order under sub section 3(1) that has to be read with sub section 4(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 
451) No. 16 of 1907, as amended by act No. 13 of 1966 (reprint), No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 
of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009.
The Order
by virtue of the powers vested in me under sub section 3(1) that has to be read with sub section 4(1) of the Forest 
Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) No. 16 of 1907, as amended by act No. 13 of 1966 (reprint), No. 56 of 1979,  
No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 of 2009, I, minister of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation 
do by this Order declare the state lands of the extent 1,600.0 hectares bounded by the limits set forth in the schedules 
1,2,3,4,5,6,7 & 8 hereto as Puwarasankulam 2 Reserved Forest from 29th day of august 2024.
 Pa vithra Wanniarachchi, 
 minister of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation.
ministry of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation, 
No. 07, hector Kobbekaduwa mawatha, Colombo 07,
29th day of august. 2024. 

<!-- page 2 -->

2a
SCHEDULE 01
the state land of 531.0 hectares located within Vavuniya and madu divisional secretary divisions of Vavuniya and mannar 
districts in the Northern province of sri Lanka located within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates 
(survey method – Geodesic coordinates epsG: 5234 method).

extent - 13.0 hectares 
SCHEDULE 07
the state land of 45.0 hectares located within Vavuniya divisional secretary division of Vavuniya district in the Northern 
province of sri Lanka located within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates (survey method – Geodesic 
coordinates epsG: 5234 method).

the state land of 11.0 hectares located within Vavuniya divisional secretary division of Vavuniya district in the Northern

eOG 09 - 0039/1
FOREST CONSER v ATION ORDINANCE
Notification
by virtue of the powers vested in me by section 63 of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) No. 16 of 1907, 
as amended by act No. 13 of 1966 (reprint), No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009, I do by this notification notify that the Puwarasankulam 2 Reserved Forest mentioned in the above order is 
subjected to the sole control of the Conservator General of Forests.
 Pa vithra Wanniarachchi, 
 minister of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation. 
ministry of Wildlife and Forest resources Conservation, 
No. 07, hector Kobbekaduwa mawatha, 
Colombo 07,
29th day of august. 2024.
